description: EricssonLeanCarrierFunction: Table containing Ericsson Lean Carrier Function configuration parameters for specific cells at a given time.  Columns: dateTime (timestamp), Area_Name (cell area name), CellId (unique cell identifier), Id2 (redundant cell identifier), Id3 (redundant identifier), vsDataType (data type identifier), vsDataFormatVersion (data format version), EricssonLeanCarrierFunction.disableElcOnPtt (disable Lean Carrier on PTT), EricssonLeanCarrierFunction.elcPdcchCrsMuting (PDCCH CRS muting enabled), EricssonLeanCarrierFunction.elcDrxOnDurationPostHeating (DRX on duration post heating), EricssonLeanCarrierFunction.ericssonLeanCarrierFunctionId (Lean Carrier Function ID), EricssonLeanCarrierFunction.elcDrxOnDurationPreHeating (DRX on duration pre heating), EricssonLeanCarrierFunction.disableElcOnVolte (disable Lean Carrier on VoLTE).
queries: Show me all EricssonLeanCarrierFunction configurations where EricssonLeanCarrierFunction.disableElcOnVolte is true for Area_Name 'Downtown'.
What is the average EricssonLeanCarrierFunction.elcDrxOnDurationPostHeating value for CellId 12345 between 2024-03-08 00:00:00 and 2024-03-08 23:59:59?
Retrieve all records where vsDataFormatVersion is 2.0 and EricssonLeanCarrierFunction.elcPdcchCrsMuting is false.
How many unique CellId values have EricssonLeanCarrierFunction.disableElcOnPtt set to true in the last 24 hours?
Find all instances where  EricssonLeanCarrierFunction.elcDrxOnDurationPreHeating differs from EricssonLeanCarrierFunction.elcDrxOnDurationPostHeating for Area_Name 'Suburbia'.
